example.code:
PS C:\> $config = New-Object Amazon.EC2.Model.ReservedInstancesConfiguration PS C:\> $config.AvailabilityZone = "us-west-2a" PS C:\> $config.InstanceCount = 1 PS C:\> $config.Platform = "EC2-VPC"
PS C:\> Edit-EC2ReservedInstance ` -ReservedInstancesId @("FE32132D-70D5-4795-B400-AE435EXAMPLE", "0CC556F3-7AB8-4C00-B0E5-98666EXAMPLE") ` -TargetConfiguration $config
example.description: This example modifies the Availability Zone, instance count, and platform for the specified Reserved instances.
